education_text.0: Aaronson had shown ability in mathematics from an early age, teaching himself      calculus at the age of 11, provoked by symbols in a babysitter's textbookAfter      redirect    postdoctorates at the      Institute for Advanced Study Institute for Advanced Study and the      University of Waterloo University of Waterloo, he took a faculty position at MIT in 2007In the summer of 2016 he moved from MIT to the      University of Texas at Austin University of Texas at Austin as David JHe has also taught a level survey course,  Quantum Computing Since Democritus ,          for which notes are available online, and have been published as a book by      Cambridge University Press Cambridge University PressHe has also taught a level survey course,  Quantum Computing Since Democritus ,          for which notes are available online, and have been published as a book by      Cambridge University Press Cambridge University PressAaronson was the subject of media attention in October 2007, when he accused Love Communications, a based      Advertising agency advertising agency, of plagiarizing a lecture          he wrote on      Quantum mechanics quantum mechanics in an advertisement of theirs
